i18n.key:
The hostname is the domain name of your website.
Beware ! Its value should neither start with http://, or https://, nor end with a /.
Examples: mydomain.com, subdomain.mydomain.com, ...
For a typical website, the port is 80.

For instance, for a website accessed at http://domaine.com/test/index.php, enter index.php in the field above.
In general, this field can be left empty.

If your website has to be accessed from within a sub-directory of your domain, you should enter the relative path of that directory.
For instance, for a website accessed at http://domaine.com/mydirectory/, enter mydirectory in the field above.
select the homepage for this website
